item.description:
I am a security researcher, interested in understanding and addressing security problems in the cyberspace. Since June 2019, I has joined Facebook as a Research Scientist, working on various security projects such as Fuzzing, Proxy Detection, and Network Reputation Prediction.

Prior to that, I had a four-year HAPPY ðŸ˜Ž experience as a PhD student in Indiana University (Go, Hoosiers!), under the supervision of Professor Feng Qian and Professor XiaoFeng Wang. Unfortunately, sooner than I expected, I was kicked out the research lab ðŸ˜œ recently. Therefore, I am on the job market to seek a PostDoc/Faculty position.
